prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with long ears and a fluffy tail that is light brown.
I want a Pokemon that looks elegant, featuring a sleek body and powerful legs.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and soft fur.
Make a rabbit-like Pokemon with distinctive white accents and a confident stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels at agility with a combination of speed and grace.
Design a Pokemon that has strong legs for jumping, with a smooth and sleek design.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, with a charming and friendly appearance.
